processing_structure.text: Specify input and output (one integer, sum of its divisors).
Loop from 1 to the input value.

advice.text: Confirm the task: read one integer and output the sum of its divisors.
Think of the top-level flow: read input, iterate candidates, test divisibility, add when true, then print sum.
Refine comments inside the loop: add a sub-step like 'if i divides n then add i to sum'; after that, start translating comments into code.
